page.title: 10Children's Hobbies etc
page.content:
I play cricket in Presteigne (5km) and rugby in Ludlow (30km).My sister goes dancing in Knighton. My brother plays on his bike and I ride my pony. We mostly play at home with my computer and ride our bikes a lot. I ride my bike and go to cubs and go swimming about 20 miles away. I mostly ride my bike and play with my computer and watch tv in the winter. We help our mum run her farm and ride our bikes. I read my books and my little brother plays with his toys.
Typical comments from a class of 22 juniors.Most activities are centred around the home with little contact with other children compared with town children.
